column1: The Old Guesthouse was an inn in Minas Tirith. It was located on the first tier
column2: on Lampwrights Street. It was surrounded on three sides by a lawn

column1: During the War of the Ring
column2: Peregrin Took met Bergil here. The inns fate is not known
column3: but it could have been destroyed in the Siege of Minas Tirith. .

column1: The Old Guesthouse was known as Sennas Iaur in Sindarin.J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: "Index questions". Quoted in Wayne G. Hammond
column5: The Lord of the Rings: A Readers Companion
